data.eml:eml: A new addition to the genus Anthalona Van Damme, Sinev & Dumont, 2011 (Branchiopoda: Anomopoda: Chydoridae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Damme, Kay Van (2016): A new addition to the genus Anthalona Van Damme, Sinev & Dumont, 2011 (Branchiopoda: Anomopoda: Chydoridae). Zootaxa 4139 (3): 439-444, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4139.3.11
